page.description: Peek at 1-bit of data, offset in bits starting at 1.
page.original:
.PEEKBIT() Syntax New_Blob as B = .PEEKBIT( Position as N ) ArgumentDescription PositionThe position of bit to return.
Description The .PEEKBIT() method returns the bit at Position. Example The following example shows the bits that make the ASCII character A. b1 = char_to_blob("A") for i = 8 to 1 step -1 ?b1.peekbit(i) next i 0.000000 1.000000 0.000000 0.000000 0.000000 0.000000 0.000000 1.000000
See Also Blob Functions and Methods
